commitResults.messageTitle: Started on iP and did level 0
commitResults.messageBody: I renamed the chatbot from Duke to Yale. I created two methods: greetUser to greet the user and exitChat to display the exit message.
Created a echo method. It uses scanner to read a line of input from the keyboard and if it is not bye (ignoring case), it will echo back the input. If input is bye, will exitchat.

Upgraded echo method to list the task or add the task depending on input. addTask will add input into array of size 100 and increase size of array accordingly. listTask will list down task number and task name.

commitResults.messageTitle: Added ability to mark and unmark tasks as done.
commitResults.messageBody: First, instead of having all methods (greet, exit,echo) in one class, i seperated them into different class (taskmanager, ui). Then, i created task class that stores if its done and description. when user says mark a certain task, yale will put X in brackets and print out the task accordingly. when commanded list, for each task, will show in brackets if its done or not.
